name: Kunai Explorer
description:
Summary

You play as a ninja architect that is looking for a golden egg within an ancient place with platforms and old tech. There are some ways to get to where the golden egg rests but it is up to you to find them. Once you obtain egg, head back to boat to leave the place.

Additional Notes

  • This is not a long game. 
  • May underperform based on PC specs.
  • Tested on laptop (GTX 960M 4GB, i5 5xxx CPU, 8GB RAM) and it dipped in rooms with fires from that testing.
  • Controls will be mentioned in game for keyboard/mouse players.
  • Controllers work in the game but no implementation for use on menus and no tutorial was provided, sorry.

Background

This is a side project that I've been working on, primarily to do some things I haven't done before. The game isn't perfect and there were some things that I would've done differently if I had to start over but this is the final version for what this project is. 

Additionally, feel free to tell me what you think or if there is a game breaking bug, let me know.

Credits

Created, Scripted, & Designed by Ronald Van

Made in Unreal Engine 4.

Assets Provided by Unreal Starter Content & Melee Weapons Pack (Karl Detroit)

Sound Effects Provided by ZapSplat & Unreal Starter Content

Music Provided By Mega Game Music Collection (Muzstation Game Music) & Immersive Dark Ambient Music Pack (W.O.W. Sound)
